title: Halden’s Ghost
outcome: Mysterious digital broadcasts feature AI-recreated Marek Halden revealing hidden truths about the Council and BCI’s past. Citywide distrust spikes as citizens embark on a treasure hunt for secret data, forging new grassroots alliances, while the Council scrambles to contain the myth and the leaks.

events.description: Citizens report strange digital broadcasts: an AI-generated Halden voice shares missing journal entries about the BCI’s darkest secrets.
The broadcasts mention hidden physical and digital caches with original BCI logs. Grassroots groups and former officials join the hunt, hoping for answers and leverage.
Council attempts to stop the broadcasts, but clues multiply, sparking spontaneous neighborhood cooperation to solve riddles left by 'Halden.'
Uncovered data exposes the Council’s role in suppressing evidence and manipulating scores. Citywide outrage leads to coordinated grassroots demands for a new public assembly.
